tripleplay.ui

Class CheckBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
      • tripleplay.ui.Widget<T>
        • tripleplay.ui.TextWidget<CheckBox>
          • tripleplay.ui.CheckBox

  • public class CheckBox
extends TextWidget<CheckBox>
    Displays a checkbox which can be toggled. The checkbox must be configured with either a font-based checkmark, or a checkmark icon, which will be shown when it is checked.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The checked status of this widget.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public void select(boolean selected)
        Updates the selected state of this checkbox. This method is called when the user taps and releases the checkbox. One can override this method if they want to react to only user-interaction-initiated changes to the checkbox's state (versus listening to checked which could be updated programmatically).
